form.congress: One Hundred Seventeenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Monday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty-two
form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to permit the use of incentive payments to expedite certain federally financed airport development projects.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2021.

section.header: Allowable cost standards for airport development projects

subsection.text: Section 47110(b)(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (1) if the cost necessarily and inserting (1)(A) if the cost necessarily;
by striking the semicolon at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: if the cost is an incentive payment incurred in carrying out the project described in subparagraph (A) that is to be provided to a contractor upon early completion of a project, if—

clause.text: such payment does not exceed the lesser of 5 percent of the initial construction contract amount or $1,000,000;
the level of contractor’s control of, or access to, the worksite necessary to shorten the duration of the project does not negatively impact the operation of the airport;
the contract specifies application of the incentive structure in the event of unforeseeable, non-weather delays beyond the control of the contractor;

nothing in any agreement with the contractor prevents the airport operator from retaining responsibility for the safety, efficiency, and capacity of the airport during the execution of the grant agreement; and
the Secretary determines that the use of an incentive payment is likely to increase airport capacity or efficiency or result in cost savings as a result of shortening the project’s duration;

subsection.text: Section 47110(e)(7) of title 49, United States Code, is amended in the heading by striking Partnership Program Airports and inserting Partnership program airports.
